summary: Dr. Daniel D. Dietrick's medical license was summarily suspended in November 2023, followed by a Consent Order in April 2024 which imposed a nine-month suspension, a professionalism course, and enrollment in the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP). After complying with these terms, the Board terminated his suspension and placed him on probation for a minimum of three years, requiring continued participation and successful discharge from MPRP.
